content.en: Opioid risk prediction: Researchers are using analytic models and algorithms to identify patients at risk for prescription opioid abuse. Prescription-monitoring programs, payers, and healthcare providers are utilizing these algorithms to detect aberrant behaviors with opioids and predict overdose among individuals prescribed opioids. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to create patient-level prediction models, clinical decision support systems, and predictive analytics to identify individuals at risk for opioid use disorder and guide intervention.
content.da: Opioid-risikoprediktion: Forskere bruger analytiske modeller og algoritmer til at identificere patienter, der er i risiko for receptpligtig opioidmisbrug. Receptovervågningsprogrammer, betalere og sundhedsudbydere anvender disse algoritmer til at opdage afvigende adfærd med opioider og forudsige overdosis blandt individer, der har fået ordineret opioider. Derudover udvikles algoritmer til at skabe patientniveau-prediktionsmodeller, kliniske beslutningsstøttesystemer og prædiktiv analyse for at identificere personer i risiko for opioidbrugslidelse og lede interventioner.
